message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. We believe its unique features and unparalleled quality justify its value at $2000000. We are confident it will bring immense value to you and look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $2000000 is a bit steep for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1400000. I believe this price is more reasonable and reflects the value I'm willing to pay for the product.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to negotiate further. Considering the value of the product and your feedback, I propose a revised price of $1700000. This still reflects the premium quality and uniqueness of the product, while being more accessible to you. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both parties.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $1700000 is still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1500000. I believe this price is more in line with my expectations and would allow me to make a decision on the product.
